originalText.text: Had a phenomenal outcome on a hip arthroscope procedure. I have 2 small children and am an active athlete. Dr Coleman made the process easy and palatable. Every question I had was answered timely. I really canâ€™t thank him enough.

originalText.text:
â€œ Great doctor with amazing staffâ€œ after suffering from severe hip pain for years. My friend advised me to schedule an appointment to see Dr. Struan Coleman at the hospital for special surgery.
Dr. Coleman truly cares about his patients and took his time to diagnose my hip problem. He had an immediate plan of action and now I am 1 year post surgery. I am able to return to playing soccer without any setbacks. From start to finish everything was so amazing. I would recommend Dr. Coleman without reservation.

originalText.text: I had a hip arthroscopy by Dr. Coleman. He was great from start to finish. He answered all of my questions. He explained my condition and how it would be handled. his staff and the staff at HSS were amazing. I would highly recommend him for anyone with a hip issue.

originalText.text: I first saw Dr. Coleman in 2017 for a knee injury which he ended up scoping and adding a PRP injection. My knee has been great ever since. Fast forward July 2021 I injured my shoulder, he suggested a USG injection which has given me relief. Dr Colemanâ€™s bedside manners is one of the best Iâ€™ve experienced heâ€™s kind and patient. Alberto & Dale are also attentive and answered all my questions.
